price: Ɛberε a dadewεnfoͻ ne dadeε nkͻnsͻnkͻnsͻn begu wͻn kͻn mu no, yεbεtwe wͻn ase akͻ -
arabic: إِذِ ٱلۡأَغۡلَٰلُ فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ وَٱلسَّلَٰسِلُ يُسۡحَبُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: idhi al-aghlālu fī aʿnāqihim wal-salāsilu yus'ḥabūna
